Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.utils

Class SoileConfigLoader

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.utils.SoileConfigLoader
public class SoileConfigLoader extends Object
Heart of the SOILE2 Configuration loading. This provides static access to the configuration and needs to be set up BEFORE anything else.
Author:
Thomas Pfau

      Returns:

    • isValidTaskType

      public static boolean isValidTaskType(String language, String version)
      Check, whether the language and version are possible.
      Parameters:
      language - the language (e.g. qmarkup, elang or psychopy
      version - the version (1.0 for elang or qmarkup, and e.g. 2022.2.5 for psychopy)
      Returns:
      whether the given language and version combination is valid
